text: 25 is a year in the 1st century. was a common year starting on Monday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Lentulus and Agrippa == Events == === Roman Empire === * Tiberius settles a dispute between Messenia and Sparta over the Ager Dentheliales on Mount Taygetus. He gives the land to Messenia. * Aelius Sejanus tries to marry the widow of Drusus Julius Caesar. * Cossus Cornelius Lentulus, Marcus Asinius Agrippa become consuls * Pomponius Mela formalizes the climatic zone system === Asia === * Han dynasty returns to China. Liu Xiu proclaimed himself Emperor. * Luoyang becomes the capital of the Houhan or Eastern Han Dynasty (25-220 CE). == Births == * Gaius Julius Civilis, German chieftain == Deaths == * Aulus Cremutius Cordus, Roman historian Category:20s
